p: A total of 30,994 children with CAP requiring hospitalization were enrolled in the present study. The characteristics of the study population are presented in Table 1. The mean age of the participants was 41.9 months (SD, 40.8 months) and 54.6% of the total study population were boys. The number of children hospitalized due to CAP was highest in fall (September to November), followed by winter (December to February), spring (March to May), and summer (June to August).
